document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

subSubSection.paragraph: 3 species are known from and are restricted to Central America.

subSubSection.paragraph: 6 species are included in this genus from the West Indies and South America.
West Indies: Cuba , Jamaica , Haiti , Grenada .
Other regions: Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Oriental , Australian.

subSubSection.paragraph: 62 species are included in this genus from Latin America.
West Indies: Cuba , Cayman Is., Jamaica , Haiti , Dominican Republic , Puerto Rico , US Virgin Isl., Guadeloupe , St. Lucia , St. Vincent & the Grenadines , Barbados , Grenada , Trinidad-Tobago.
Central America: Mexico , Guatemala , Nicaragua , Costa Rica , Panama .
South America: Colombia , Venezuela , Galapagos Isl., Peru , Brazil , Chile , Argentina .
Other regions: Nearctic, Palaearctic, Ethiopian, Madagascan, Oriental , Australian, Oceanic.
